sqlMap.select: SELECT DISTINCT(ISS_CD) "ISS_CD",ISS_NAME FROM GIIS_ISSOURCE ORDER BY 1 ASC
SELECT DISTINCT ACCT_ISS_CD,ISS_CD ,ISS_NAME FROM GIIS_ISSOURCE ORDER BY ISS_CD

SELECT str || ']}' from(SELECT '{ rows: [' || replace(str,'^',',')str FROM( SELECT (SELECT SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(str, '^'),2)csv FROM( SELECT str,row_number() over (order by rownum) rn, count (*) over () cnt from (SELECT '{id:' || rownum || ', data: ["' || a.iss_cd || '", "' || REPLACE(a.iss_name,'''','`') || '",' || a.PDF_SW || ',"' || a.CRED_PDF_SW || '"]}' str from ( SELECT ISS_CD, ISS_NAME,DECODE(PDF_SW, 'Y','true','false')PDF_SW, DECODE(CRED_PDF_SW,'Y','true','false')CRED_PDF_SW FROM GIIS_ISSOURCE ORDER BY 2 ASC) a) ) WHERE rn = cnt START WITH rn = 1 CONNECT BY rn = PRIOR rn + 1)str FROM DUAL))

SELECT iss_cd,iss_name FROM GIIS_ISSOURCE WHERE ISS_CD IN(SELECT distinct a.iss_cd FROM giis_user_grp_line a, giis_users b,giis_user_grp_dtl c WHERE a.user_grp = b.user_grp AND a.user_grp = c.user_grp AND a.tran_cd = c.tran_cd AND b.user_id = #userId# AND a.tran_cd = #tranCd# UNION SELECT distinct a.iss_cd FROM giis_user_line a,giis_user_iss_cd b WHERE a.USERID = #userId# AND b.USERID = a.USERID AND b.ISS_CD = a.ISS_CD AND b.TRAN_CD = a.TRAN_CD AND a.tran_cd = #tranCd#) ORDER BY 2
sqlMap.update: UPDATE GIIS_ISSOURCE SET PDF_SW = ?, CRED_PDF_SW = ? WHERE TRIM(ISS_CD) = TRIM(?)
